TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Instruments and materials for open and laparascopic surgery and titanium joints

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: Instruments and materials for open and laparascopic surgery and titanium joints for the annual requirements of the Clinics. Detailed description provided in the technical specification

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Laparascopic instruments -Trocars with universal cannula and with the ability to separate the convector

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: cannuals of 5,11,12 and 15 mm length

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Endoscopic staplers and Patrons with integrate knife in the patron with equal and variable dimensions of joints
Endoscopic staplers with diameter 12 mm and patrons without knife, for laparascopic interventions
Staplers and partons with a knife
Instrument Electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure Generators

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: electrode of 22 mm and knife 20 mm

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Instrument Electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure Generators

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: electrode length 12 mm knife 12 mm

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Instrument — electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure generators or equivalent,

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: electrode with a length of 19,5mm, with knife 17,8mm and possibility for foot and hand activation, blunt tip and two sided jaw opening

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Instrument-electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure generators or equivalent

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: electrode with a length of 20mm, with knife 18mm and possibility for foot and hand activation, jaw opening 13mm, possibility for foot and hand activation and Maryland jaw type or equivalently

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Instrument — electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure generators or equivalent

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: for open surgery with a sine-shaped, curved jaw with a length of 16.5mm and a knife length of 15mm, possibility of foot and hand automatic activation

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Instrument-electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure generators or equivalent

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: , for open surgery with curved jaw with a length of 36mm and a knife length of 34mm, possibility of foot and hand activation

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Instrument — electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure generators or equivalent

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: for laparoscopic surgery with electrode with length of 22mm with knife 20mm, possibility of foot and hand activation

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Instrument — electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure generators or equivalent

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: for laparoscopic surgery with electrode with length of 18mm with knife 12mm, possibility of foot and hand activation and dolphin tip

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Instrument — electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure generators or equivalent

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: for laparoscopic surgery with electrode with length of 19,5mm with knife 17,8mm, possibility of foot and hand activation and blunt tip and two sided jaw opening

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Instrument — electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure generators or equivalent,

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: for open surgery with electrode with length of 20mm with knife 18mm, possibility of foot and hand activation, jaw opening 13mm, hand activation and Maryland jaw type or equivalently

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Instrument — electrode compatible for Force Triad and Ligure generators or equivalent,

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: for laparoscopic surgery with bend Maryland tip electrode, with length of 20mm, with knife 18,5mm, with a retractable L monopolar hook which, if necessary, replaces the electrode. To have the possibility of rotating the body of the instrument 315º, as well as a handle for replacing the electrode with the monopole hook and its retraction

Endoscopic automatic clipper with 360º rotating body with diameter of 5mm and working length 33cm, pre-filled with 16 locking titanium clips and an LCD display showing the number of clips. The clips should have a mechanism for leveling the jaws to prevent their crossing. Closing the clips should be from the knives to the head. The jaw should be empty, with the possibility of removing the clip in the jaw before closing, the forehead and the sidewall of the jaw. It should have a safety mechanism for locking the handle after the blowing of all the clips.

360º rotating body with diameter of 10mm and working length 29cm, pre-filled with 20 locking titanium clips. Clip locking should be from the knives to the head. The jaw should be empty, with the possibility of removing the clip in the jaw before closing, forehead and side jaw opening. It should have a safety mechanism for locking the handle after emptying all the clips and a visible indicator.

Endoscope automatic clipper, with 360º rotating body with diameter of 10mm and working length 33cm, pre-filled with 15 locking titanium clips. Clip locking should be from the knives to the head. The jaw should empty, with the possibility of removing the clip in the jaw before closing, forehead and side jaw opening. It should ave a safety mechanism for locking the handle after emptying all the clips and a visible indicator.
with 360º rotating body with diameter of 10mm and working length 28cm pre-filled with 20 locking titanium clips. The jaw opening should be lateral, at an angle of 90º with the body of the instrument.

Automatic opening calliper for open surgery with jaw opening and jaw angle of 30º and with automatic clip closing mechanism, with length of 11.5 inches, pre-filled with 30 locking titanium clips, with rectangular cross-sectional shape 0,47mm x 0.76mm and span of the jaw of 3.5-4mm.
Polyurethane laparoscopic sampling bags, with round metal lactern, closing line for the bag and separation from the circular metal lactern and body of the instrument with a diameter of 15mm
Polyurethane laparoscopic sampling bags, with round metal lactern, closing line for the bag and separation from the circular metal lactern and body of the instrument with a diameter of 10mm
Polyurethane laparoscopic sampling bags with body instrument diameter of 10mm

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Polyurethane laparoscopic sampling bags with body instrument diameter of 10mm

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Polyurethane laparoscopic sampling bags with body instrument diameter of 10mm
Laparoscopic extraction Memory bag for 10mm troacar with nitinol wire with memory effect vol. 1200ml, ectrolytic bag 130mm

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: An inflatable pair of cuff cuffs

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: An inflatable pair of cuff cuffs compatible for an intermittent pneumatic compression machine SCD express or an equivalent

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: An inflatable pair of cuff cuffs

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: An inflatable pair of cuff cuffs compatible for an intermittent pneumatic compression machine SCD express or an equivalent

Upper body caps made up of two-layered light material resistent to laceration, fluid and stinging, latex-free, RTG transparent without the influence of RTG rays, for adult patients suitable (optional) for an operating room compatible for already existing heater at the Warmtouch Clinic 6000 or equivalent

Monopolar laparoscopic scissors wit curvature Metzenbaum or equivalent, serrated, curved tips on the left, and with inserted tungsten carbide steel for greater strength, — length 29-33 cm and diameter 5 mm, with the possibility of disassembling the components. The handle should be with an ergonomic design and without a braking mechanism, with a large contact surface for the fingers and to be isolated with a special PEEK polymer (polyether-etherketone), the jaw (16mm) should be pointed, to have an insulated outer tube 5/5 mm and 29 -33 cm long.
Laparoscopic instrument with articulation and with la palette of five fingers
Curved scissors for open surgery compatible with existing Harmonic generator with hand activation 23cm / 5mm, gun scissor or equivalent
Curved scissors for endoscopic surgery compatible with existing Harmonic generator with manual activation 36cm / 5mm, gun scissor or equivalent
Resorptive kidney prosthesis for polyglacial tissue of polyglactin 910
Special ureteral cystoscope catheter with a wire bucket for extraction of stone from the ureter, Metal 4 helical wire from nitinol for extracting calculus from Ureter
Special ureteral cystoscope catheter with a wire bucket for extraction of stone from the ureter, Metal 4 helical wire from nitinol for extracting calculus from Ureter
Special ureteral cystoscope catheter with a wire bucket for extraction of stone from the ureter, Metal 4 helical wire from nitinol for extracting calculus from Ureter
Special ureteral cystoscope catheter with a wire bucket for extraction of stone from the ureter, Metal 3 helical wire from nitinol for extracting calculus from Ureter

Special ureteral cystoscope catheter with a wire bucket for extraction of stone from the ureter, Metallic wire of nitinol for extract calculus from Ureter with lateral adapter on the handle type parallel 3-6 wire basket

Special ureteral cystoscope catheter with a wire bucket for extracting a stone from the ureter, Metal wire from nitinol for extract calculus from Ureter with side adapter of the handle type helixal 3-6 wire basket
Titanium clips for ligation, placed in a warehouse compatible for existing clip applicators Aesculap / Small or equivalent
Titanium clips for ligation, placed in a warehouse compatible for existing clip applicators Aesculap / Medium or equivalent
Titanium clips for ligation, placed in a warehouse compatible for existing clip applicators Aesculap / Medium-Large or equivalent
Titanium clips for ligation, placed in a warehouse compatible for existing clip applicators Aesculap / Aesculap/Large or equivalent
Biopsy gun for multiple use with a choice of 2 depths of penetration 15mm and 22mm
Needles for biopsy — rose
Plastic clips of non-resorptive polymer, with a safety protection system composed of 1x2 toothbrushes. 5-13 mm, compatible for the existing Hem-o-lok Aplaer or equivalent.
Plastic clips of non-resorptive polymer, with a safety protection system composed of 1x2 toothbrushes. 7-16 mm, compatible for the existing Hem-o-lok Aplaer or equivalent.

F02_ANNEX_B.LOT_TITLE: Solution against blurring of the laparoscopic camera

LOT_DESCRIPTION.P: Solution against blurring of the laparoscopic camera.
Needle guide set (plastic needle holder for biopsy).

Calciable compatible for use with the "Waterun" manufacturer's Intelligent shoe cover dispenser, packed in cartridges (boxes) of minimum 100 pieces, the cartridges (boxes) are compatible with the intended space in the dispenser for their accommodation, Dimensions of space for ketringi: height 31cm, width 15cm, depth 11cm. On the outer side of the ketridge there is a magnetic strip indicating the presence of the ketter on the dispenser.
